parameters: Returned to the safe zone...
It's already late at night...
\n<\n[3]>Ha... ha... finally made it back.
\n<\n[3]>We've really gotten ourselves into big trouble this time...
I wonder if anyone will come to assassinate us over there?
Like Inukai?
\n<\n[3]>I don't care anymore...I'm going to hide out at my own place for a few days first.
\n<\n[3]>\N[1] Check your situation...
If there's nothing else, come out again.
\n<\n[3]>I'll say goodbye for now...
.....I thought I could leave the third storage after today's task.
Didn't expect to get caught up in such an event.
....Sato is already dead,
What should we do next...
\n<\n[2]>Mr. Inoshita...
\n<\n[2]>Honey...there's still time
Let's go home and think about it slowly.
\..\..\..Let's go back home first.
NewClo
There's no turning back now...
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 4 0
\n<???>You're Mr.\n[1], right?
At this time, no one else would come here.
Yes
Yes
\n<???>Good, I'm the person in contact with Mr. Sato
For now, I am the deputy manager here.
Time is tight, so I'll briefly explain the situation and the task.
\n<Deputy Chief>Simply put, you need to disguise yourselves as higher-ups coming for an inspection.
Steal the experimental data stored within the company during the inspection.
How to steal?
How to steal?
\n<Deputy Chief>Currently, there are only a few managers left at headquarters responsible for administrative work.
The remaining thirty or so people, regardless of rank, are all experimental staff.
\n<Deputy Chief>And the direct leader of these lab technicians, also the highest-ranking person here,
is the head of the B-level Science Department, Suzuki.
We suspect that he has been inciting other researchers to secretly store data,
attempting to betray the company.
\n<Deputy Chief>There are two reasons for your visit to Suzuki this time:
First, you are posing as the secretary of a certain Grade A VIP, coming as an inspector to assess the situation.
Second, you need to address the equipment issues within the company.
\n<Deputy Chief>After discussing with Sato, the roles assigned to you are as follows:
Madam, since personnel information is stored in the company's database, it's the least likely to raise suspicion.
You'll be acting as that secretary.
\n<\n[2]>Alright, I understand.
\n<Deputy Chief>Mr. Inoshita, serve as the escort for Ms. [2].
You know those people under Suzuki have ill intentions toward foreign workers.
A lady acting alone might face danger,
which could also impact our upcoming plans.
\n<\n[3]>Oh oh, does this mean I have to team up with Mrs. \N[2]?
You guys are pretty good at organizing tasks, huh~
\n<\n[2]>Hmm... It's indeed a relatively reasonable arrangement...
\n<\n[2]>Eh... Can't we swap responsibilities?
\n<Deputy Chief>Once you two enter, Suzuki and several representatives of the experimental staff will guide you.
They'll show you around the company and the lab but won’t reveal anything important.
They’re probably just stalling for time,
but that actually works to our advantage for the plan.
\n<Deputy Chief>\n[1], your role is to act as a technical expert addressing equipment issues.
The real task is to stall them while the other two engage with the group.
Use the chance to act alone and gather intelligence.
\n<Deputy Chief>Of course, I was the one who secretly sabotaged the equipment.
The solution is quite simple: just put this back in the designated spot.
Obtained facility parts
\n<Deputy Chief>\N[1], You need an excuse to work alone and head to the Information Department on the 10th floor.
Obtain the unuploaded intelligence hidden by those people.
Sato mentioned that you’re the leader of this squad and the most experienced explorer,
which is why I entrusted you with the most important task.
\n<Deputy Chief> Confirm once more, after entering the company
Ms.\N[2] and Mr. Inoshita, along with that group of supervisors, toured the company,
And delay as much as possible, during which I'll also follow you two.
\n<Deputy Chief>Mr. \n[1], after briefly greeting them, head to the 10th-floor Information Department.
Find the relevant person in charge to hand over the work and gather intelligence while pretending to work.
After obtaining the intel, repair the facility to complete the task and contact \n[2] by phone.
Let us know when the repairs are done, and we’ll evacuate together.
\n<Deputy Chief>That's about it. Do you have any other questions?
Can I change jobs?
specific location of the intelligence?
Is all the intel on the 10th floor?
Nothing
Can I change jobs?
\n<Deputy Chief> No, based on our conditions,
The inspection can only be handled by \N[2].
Based on your experience, gathering intelligence can only be entrusted to \N[1] you.
No room for mistakes.
\n<\n[3]>\N[1], that's the mission assignment~
With great power comes great responsibility.
\n<\n[3]>Just focus on gathering intelligence,
Myself and \N[2] will do our best to hold off those people~
specific location of the intelligence?
\n<Deputy Chief> I only know it's on the 10f.
Suzuki, who is in charge here, is very vigilant.
As an unrelated worker, I am prohibited from going to important floors.
Is all the intel on the 10th floor?
\n<Deputy Chief>Not sure, but probably not
I don't think the most important information would be stored in the Information Department.
But there's definitely a lot of information being concealed in the information department.
\n<Deputy Chief>Even if the needed information is placed elsewhere...
We also need to go to the 10th floor first to gather clues on that intelligence.
Nothing
\n<Deputy Chief>There's no time to lose, let's go in quickly.
\n<Deputy Chief>Suzuki, they are waiting for you in the lobby.
Mie-O
\n<\n[2]>There's no time to waste, \N[1], let's get inside quickly~

parameters.name: 高音-うそ（信じられない）

parameters: \n<\n[2]> Sigh, what a ridiculous arrangement...
A
\n<Deputy Chief>Suzuki and his group are inside, hurry in.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 5 0
\n<Sato>I arranged to meet Yamashita here in half an hour.
Wait here for him to come.\|
\n<Sato>It's not convenient for him to see you. You'd better hurry inside.
No need to worry about anything for the last mission, let's wrap it up quickly.\|
Will Yamashita listen to you?
Will the people inside believe us?
Will Yamashita listen to you?
\n<Sato>Yamashita went against headquarters' wishes to negotiate with this group.
Although the mission was completed, a review is definitely necessary.
\n<Sato>At this final moment,
He certainly doesn’t want to clash with me, the radical one.
So yes, he will definitely listen to me, at least for the next few hours.
\n<Sato>As long as we complete the task within these few hours,
It doesn’t matter how he ends up afterward.\|
\n<Sato>As for those researchers inside,
Let's take all the supplies controlled in the slum area.
It’s said to be support from headquarters.\|
\n<Sato>Perhaps it can temporarily alleviate their suspicions.
As for how long we can hold off those researchers...
It’s time to see the lady’s...\|
Will the people inside believe us?
\n<Sato>To be honest, I wouldn’t believe it either.
That’s why we took all the supplies controlled by the slum over there.
They said it’s support from the headquarters.
\n<Sato>As for how long we can hold off that group from the institute,
It’s up to you now.
\n<Sato>Yamashita’s words, at a time like this,
He definitely doesn’t want to have a conflict with me, the radical one.
I am confident I can hold him off for several hours.\|
\n<Sato>As long as the task is completed within these few hours,
It doesn’t matter what happens to him afterward.\|
\n<Sato> Now, once you go in, someone will be there to receive you\|
\n<Sato> Let's work together for one last mission.
\n<Sato>I have nothing left to confess.
You guys go inside quickly.
\n<Sato>I'll be here waiting for Yamashita to come for negotiations.
\n<\n[2]>Ah! Mr. Sato!
Sato is lying on the ground... with several bullet holes in his chest.
\n<\n[3]>This guy... was killed by Yamashita, right?
Yamashita never intended to negotiate any terms with him.
\n<\n[3]>At a time like this,
Still thinking about the rules of civilized society,
So pathetic.
\..\..It seems that there's no hope left.
\n<\n[3]> Hey, what are you standing around here for?
Waiting to die? Hurry back to the safe zone!
Let's retreat for now.
A
Sato is no longer breathing...
There's nothing useful on me.
I wonder if there's any ambush ahead...
Better get ready before moving forward.
Would you like to save your progress?
Yes
No
Yes
SceneManager.push(Scene_Save);
No
Do you want to go to the underground parking garage?
Yes
No
Yes
No
This is the final task...
Don't know what awaits us ahead.
Yamashita is a master of strategy...
Maybe during the final collaboration, they'll stab us in the back.
\n<\n[3]> Go to the underground parking lot to find Yamashita, right?
\n<\n[2]> According to the plan, we are supposed to return to the residential area
on that floor to retrieve the data...
\n<\n[2]> According to the plan, we are supposed to meet Yamashita first in the underground garage.
Let's go back to that level of the residential area together later to retrieve the data...
In short, the data is our bargaining chip for getting out alive...
Let's check out the underground garage first.
A
This is Mikura Biotech...
What a tall building.
Although Mikura Bio originated in Mikura City, as it grew and developed,
The headquarters have been relocated to a larger city.
But the size of the division remaining here is still quite large.
Being able to be a manager here, she truly is an outstanding person....
\n<\n[2]>Here we are, this is my company!
\n<\n[3]>Oh, that looks really impressive...
It's indeed the largest company in our Mikura area.
\n<\n[3]>But after all this time,
It's a ruthless company doing crazy experiments to make money.
\n<\n[3]>Im sure u are a wicked woman, isn't u?
\n<\n[2]>Mr. Inoshita, please don't joke around...
\n<\n[2]>Here we are, this is our company!
\n<\n[3]>Oh, that looks really impressive...
No wonder this is the largest enterprise in our Mikura area.
\n<\n[3]>But after all this time,
It's a ruthless company doing crazy experiments to make money.
\n<\n[3]>Im sure u are a wicked woman, isn't u?
\n<\n[2]>Unfortunately, I am not aware of the work details of this experiment department...
Maybe \N[2] really don't know...
With her upright character,
she would not allow herself to get involved in these things.
A
The one in the suit... is that the person responsible for the handover?
Go to the liaison to receive the mission briefing...
Go to the liaison to receive the mission briefing...
